post.description: Registers a new client and returns the client data with an access token
Login a client and return an access token
Logout a client by invalidating the token

get.description: Fetch all pets from the database with optional filters

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter pets by type (e.g., Dog, Cat)

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Filter pets by gender (e.g., Male, Female)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Filter pets by size (e.g., Small, Medium, Large)

post.description: Create a new pet and store it in the database

get.description: Fetch a pet by its ID from the database

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the pet to retrieve

put.description: Update the details of an existing pet

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the pet to update

delete.description: Remove a pet from the database

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the pet to delete

post.description: Upload and update the photos of a specific pet.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the pet whose photos are to be updated.

requestBody.description: Array of photo files to upload

put.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information

post.description: Update the authenticated user's profile photo

photo_url.description: The profile photo file to upload
